text: A musical programme on classical music and songs organized by the Kegalle District Secretariat and the District Cultural Board with the association of the Department of Cultural Affairs will be held on 06th of this month at 2.00 pm at the Kegalle Town Hall.Veteran singers including Dr. Dayaratne Ranatunge, Priya Suriyasena, Punsiri Zoysa, Rohana Bogoda, Thyaga N Edward, Dhanapala Udawatte, Upali Kannangara, Rupa Indumathi will perform at this event.
title: Subhavitha Gee Viyamana at Kegalle
